posts.post_content:
If you want an individual card/cards, let me know and I'll give you a price. First taker gets it. 

Most forms of payment okay. If paypal, pay as friend; thanks.

I am always looking to upgrade [Good or better], so if you're interested in trading please send me a list of what you have. I prefer ungraded cards.

No pm's, please. Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url], or post here. 

KELLEY [thin layer of scrapbook residue blurs back]--SOLD--  
COLLINS, Minn [card has some nice attributes--no apparent creases, fairly sharp corners--but has an ink[?] mark in front and much paper-loss in back]--SOLD--   
Chase, dark cap [decent but for that spot of paper-loss on left-hand border],
Howell, portrait [best condition in the bunch],
Fletcher,
Blackburne [creased or torn? 1/4" in right-hand border, otherwise nice card],
Maloney,
Anderson--TRADED-- 
Bliss [upon scrutiny, a faint pencil erasure/imprint of "372" can be seen on back],
Miller, Dallas, SL [note spot of paper-loss on belt]--SOLD--   
Howard, Savannah, SL--SOLD--  
Powell.

*Note on Scans: As the page is turned, the backs are in reverse order. Also, the cards are in two protective plastics, a halved penny-sleeve--which creates the appearance of a vertical line on each card--and a pocket-page:

Four sold; thanks, Jeff.
Three new additions [Chase, Howell and Powell] combined with five from the old thread; all eight for $145.
